explains: v. 得罪，冒犯；令人不悦，令人不舒服；<正式> 犯罪，违法；<正式> 违犯，违反

sentences.en: A TV interviewer must be careful not to offend.
sentences.cn: 电视采访者必须小心别得罪人。

sentences.en: Neil did not mean to offend anybody with his joke.
sentences.cn: 尼尔开那个玩笑并非想冒犯谁。

sentences.en: I try to offend the least amount of people possible.
